result.eng: They thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ga: ghabh siad buíochas le dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.orig: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.html: ghabh siad buíochas le dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ponchtml: ġaḃ siad buíoċas le dia as iad a ṫaḃairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.

result.eng: They moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ga: bhog siad go dtí an fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do ghiúdaigh na polainne
result.orig: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.html: bhog siad go dtí an fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do ghiúdaigh na polainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ponchtml: ḃog siad go dtí an ḟrainc mar is maiṫ a d'airiġ siad an ċontúirt a ḃí ann do ġiúdaiġ na polainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.

result.eng: There's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ga: níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.orig: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.html: níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ponchtml: níl contúirt ort dearmad a ḋéanaṁ díom nuair a ḃeas mé ar ẛiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
